backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing role‑based repair ticket management with CRUD operations, status updates, and access‑controlled queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence file describing image‑related UI updates, affected components, and associated test coverage.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files detailing routing, components, hooks, pages, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens for the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React layout with header, navigation, routing, and role‑based UI behavior using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Authentication button component handling Internet Identity login/logout and query cache resets.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Wrapper that blocks access for unauthenticated users and displays a sign‑in prompt.
frontend/src/components/StatusHistoryTim: Timeline renderer showing ticket status history with formatted dates and notes.
frontend/src/components/TicketStatusBadg: Badge component mapping ticket status values to labels and visual variants.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing the authenticated or anonymous backend actor with automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useRole.ts: Exposes hooks to fetch the caller's user role and determine admin status via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTickets.ts: Defines React Query hooks for creating, fetching, and updating repair tickets through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a light/dark theme using CSS variables for a charcoal/amber design.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CreateTicketPage.tsx: Implements a form for creating repair tickets and displays a confirmation view after submission.
frontend/src/pages/MyTicketsPage.tsx: Displays the logged‑in user's repair tickets with sorting, status badges, and navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/StaffDashboardPage.ts: Staff‑only dashboard for viewing, filtering, and updating all repair tickets with admin checks.
frontend/src/pages/TicketDetailsPage.tsx: Renders a ticket details view with loading and error states, showing customer/device info and status history using various UI components.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and manipulate hash query params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, fonts, animations, plugins, and content scanning paths.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, features, issues, and image requirements for the HEIFIX app.
